ABOUT-ME.INTRODUCTION: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Ingolstadt. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT-ME.ENVIRONMENT: I am flexible regarding working environments and locations. I can work effectively on-site in Ingolstadt, remotely, or relocate if necessary.
ABOUT-ME.OPENMIND: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT-ME.PROFESSION: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILL-SET.JOURNEY: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILL-SET.CONTACTME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PORTFOLIO.EXPLORE1: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with
PORTFOLIO.EXPLORE2: projects to see my skills in action.

CONTACT.INTEREST: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
